items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Utility bill issued by London City Utilities confirms address details.
Annual accounts for 2022, 2021, and 2020 available with Ellipro scores.
Bank account and SWIFT code details provided, postal code matches headquarters address.
Headquarters address matches legal address provided in data.
Annual report confirms no compliance issues; discusses transition to a greener economy.
Business scope includes operations in Consumer & Community Banking and Corporate Banking.
No issues found in PEP screening as per the annual report.
Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars reported for the year ended December 31, 2023.
Market capitalization of 489,320 million dollars reported as of December 31, 2023.
